resources.string:
Hey friends. 

I have an emergency situations at work and I have yo go there ASAP. I need somebody yo take Caren to her dancing class. Cloud any of you help me out!. 

Many thanks!.

Send to. 

Johanna Johnson, Konstantine Bukowski, Matthew Green, Molly Masisson, Betty Draper, Marsha Hunter

/ i agreed to drive. 

in case Betty approves you as the drive, you will be notified, and this ride will appear in your schedule.
